channel.title: Server status says offline, but it's actually online AND people CAN connect? :S
channel.description:
Yeah so my server's online and people can connect, but on google and on here and every other status checker says that the server's offline.
Why? It's a PI server if that helps
If you can help add my msn cjolden@googlemail.com I have teamviewer so you can use that if you need to

item.title: Server status says offline, but it's actually online AND people CAN connect? :S
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“conja, post:1, topic:414665”]Yeah so my server’s online and people can connect, but on google and on here and every other status checker says that the server’s offline.

Why? It’s a PI server if that helps

If you can help add my msn cjolden@googlemail.com I have teamviewer so you can use that if you need to[/quote]
How are you hosting the server?
